<wd l="1574" t="14002" r="1925" b="14146"><run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="800" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="1" scale="1000">

,</run>

<leftBorder type="single" width="34"/>
<topBorder type="single" width="10"/>
<rightBorder type="single" width="10"/>

<dd l="5918" t="15014" r="6346" b="15168">
